main event: A baseball-shaped object, the size of a basketball, hovered for forty minutes without any sound in Grand Rapids, Michigan.
interesting points: The object hovered in a static position for 20-30 minutes.
The object was observed to be the size of a basketball.
No sound was reported from the object.
The report notes that the data is not conclusive and that motion and position information is missing.
The conclusion of the report is that the object was probably a balloon.
sighted object: A baseball-shaped object, the size of a basketball
